snippet.title: Outriders Worldslayer - Official Gameplay Overview
snippet.description:
Check out all the new ways Outriders Worldslayer will not only challenge you, but how you'll be upgrading your character to take on those challenges. Also, with mods and gear to discover, you'll be further developing your build through the new PAX class trees, the long-term progression Ascension System and the game changing third mod slots found only on Apocalypse Gear.

#IGN #Gaming #Outriders
